task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 268°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure, as my current pitch is level with the horizon.
I am currently looking upwards but not facing the building; I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly to the west.
I need to look up again to assess the full height of the building from ground to roof.
I need to adjust my heading back to 268° to face the building directly while looking up.
Now that I am facing the building and looking up, I can assess the height from the ground to the roof; I estimate the height to be approximately 50 meters.
